{"summary": "Write regression tests for interactive shorthand parsing in session mode, covering command rewriting, session event logging, and shorthand expansion logic.", "project": {"language": "python"}, "files": [{"path": "tests/test_session_shorthand.py", "content": """"Tests for interactive shorthand parsing in session mode."""

from __future__ import annotations

import importlib.util
import json
import sys
from pathlib import Path


def _load_cli_module():
    root = Path(__file__).resolve().parents[1]
    cli_path = root / "scripts" / "elephant_cli.py"
    spec = importlib.util.spec_from_file_location("elephant_cli_local", cli_path)
    if spec is None or spec.loader is None:
        raise RuntimeError("Unable to load scripts/elephant_cli.py")
    module = importlib.util.module_from_spec(spec)
    sys.modules[spec.name] = module
    spec.loader.exec_module(module)
    return module


def _load_runner_module():
    root = Path(__file__).resolve().parents[1]
    runner_path = root / "scripts" / "benchmark_runner.py"
    spec = importlib.util.spec_from_file_location("benchmark_runner_local", runner_path)
    if spec is None or spec.loader is None:
        raise RuntimeError("Unable to load scripts/benchmark_runner.py")
    module = importlib.util.module_from_spec(spec)
    sys.modules[spec.name] = module
    spec.loader.exec_module(module)
    return module


elephant_cli = _load_cli_module()
benchmark_runner = _load_runner_module()


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_handles_slash_prefix():
    parts = ["/plan", "--task", "add feature"]
    rewritten = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert rewritten[0] == "plan"
    assert rewritten[1:] == ["--task", "add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_preserves_flags():
    parts = ["/code", "--output", "json", "--task", "fix bug"]
    rewritten = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert rewritten == ["code", "--output", "json", "--task", "fix bug"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_noop_for_normal_commands():
    parts = ["plan", "--task", "add feature"]
    rewritten = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert rewritten == parts


def test_session_log_path_sanitizes_id():
    root = Path("/tmp")
    session_id = "bad/id:with<chars>"
    path = benchmark_runner._session_log_path(root, session_id)
    assert "bad_id_with_chars" in path.name
    assert ".jsonl" in path.name


def test_session_log_path_rejects_empty_id():
    root = Path("/tmp")
    try:
        benchmark_runner._session_log_path(root, "   ")
        assert False, "Expected ValueError"
    except ValueError:
        pass


def test_append_session_event_writes_jsonl(tmp_path: Path):
    session_id = "test_session"
    elephant_cli.ensure_project_layout(tmp_path)
    elephant_cli._append_session_event(tmp_path, session_id, "user", "hello")
    log_path = benchmark_runner._session_log_path(tmp_path, session_id)
    assert log_path.exists()
    line = log_path.read_text(encoding="utf-8").strip()
    record = json.loads(line)
    assert record["role"] == "user"
    assert record["content"] == "hello"
    assert "timestamp" in record


def test_load_session_context_returns_empty_for_new_session(tmp_path: Path):
    session_id = "new_session"
    elephant_cli.ensure_project_layout(tmp_path)
    history, context = elephant_cli._load_session_context(tmp_path, session_id)
    assert history == ""
    assert context == {}


def test_load_session_context_loads_events(tmp_path: Path):
    session_id = "loaded_session"
    elephant_cli.ensure_project_layout(tmp_path)
    elephant_cli._append_session_event(tmp_path, session_id, "user", "first")
    elephant_cli._append_session_event(tmp_path, session_id, "assistant", "second")
    history, context = elephant_cli._load_session_context(tmp_path, session_id)
    assert "user: first" in history
    assert "assistant: second" in history


def test_parse_shorthand_command_expands_plan():
    parts = ["/p", "--task", "add feature"]
    rewritten = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert rewritten[0] == "plan"


def test_parse_shorthand_command_expands_code():
    parts = ["/c", "--task", "fix bug"]
    rewritten = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert rewritten[0] == "code"


def test_parse_shorthand_command_expands_agents():
    parts = ["/a", "--task", "analyze code"]
    rewritten = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert rewritten[0] == "agents"


def test_parse_shorthand_command_expands_stats():
    parts = ["/s"]
    rewritten = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert rewritten[0] == "stats"


def test_parse_shorthand_command_expands_git():
    parts = ["/g"]
    rewritten = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert rewritten[0] == "git"


def test_parse_shorthand_command_expands_test():
    parts = ["/t"]
    rewritten = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert rewritten[0] == "test"


def test_parse_shorthand_command_expands_session():
    parts = ["/se"]
    rewritten = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert rewritten[0] == "session"
"}], "dependencies": {"dependencies": {}, "devDependencies": {}, "python": [], "pythonDev": ["pytest>=8.0.0"], "rust": [], "go": [], "cpp": []}, "commands": ["pytest tests/test_session_shorthand.py -v"]}
